Name: Turbocharger
Description: Boosts speed significantly but slightly reduces reliability and range.

Name: Sport Tires
Description: Improves handling greatly with minor speed and reliability trade-offs.

Name: Lightweight Frame
Description: Increases speed and range but reduces reliability slightly.

Name: Reinforced Suspension
Description: Enhances handling and reliability with minor range and fuel efficiency costs.

Name: Eco Engine
Description: Improves fuel efficiency and range but slightly reduces speed.
